title: enrolled M.S., Data Analyst and Program Evaluation
description_1: Core courses: Advanced regression, Data Programming in R, Data Wrangling and Project Management

title: Graduate Researcher
description_1: Conducted regional proxy and instrumental climate data clean and wrangling to get high-resolution temperature change data sets in China over the past 1000 years
description_2: Designed and implemented clustering, EOF and regression analysis to catch temperature signals from proxy data including tree ring, ice-core and historical documents
description_3: Visualized temperature change on annual and decadal scales in China over the past 1000 years

title: Research Assistant
description_1: Conducted Instrumental climate data clean and wrangling to get a China climate change data set with monthly resolution over the past 100 years
description_2: Visualized spatial and temporal distribution of temperature and precipitation in China over the past 100 years
description_3: Evaluated urbanization effects on climate trends in China

title: Project Coordinator
description_1: Conducted climate data analysis to clarify the fact of climate change at high altitude wetland areas in China
description_2: Designed and implemented conservation program on climate adaptation at high altitude wetland areas
description_3: Cooperated with surrounding countries on high altitude wetland conservation

title: Project Manager
description_1: Sought wind power, biomass and other new energy projects with carbon emission reductions in China for equity investment
description_2: Implemented carbon emission reductions calculation and project profitability analysis on potential new energy projects
description_3: led a small team with 2 full-time employees

title: Engineer / Deputy director of a division since 2012
description_1: Coordinated Smart Weather program to support the construction of smart Beijing
description_2: Coordinated internal meteorological data environment updating
description_3: Provided weather supports to National Day mass parade, world championships, Beijing Marathon and the preparation of 2022 Winter Olympics
